label: Radionuclide
comment: A radionuclide atom that has excess nuclear energy, making it unstable.

datatypeProperties.comment: The indication of whether or not this radioactive radionuclide has a low dispersible status.
The indication of whether or not this radioactive radionuclide has a special form.

referencedBy.comment: The radionuclide details specified for this radioactive isotope.
